entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
